name: Wandering Wizard: Stick with it
description:
Monsters have invaded your home and they want the colours, and they will take them, no matter what. Protect your world and the magicless people in it. 

Diversifiers:

  • Under Pressure
  • Loot, Loot, Loot!
  • Character Building
  • No Way Out
  • Endless Waves
